sentences.en: At sunup next morning Mr. Scott came.

sentences.en: Mr. Scott and Mr. Edwards were with Pa, and Mr. Scott was talking earnestly.

sentences.en: Mr. Scott started to speak, but Pa stopped him.

sentences.en: They saw Scott and Melissa making out in Scott's car.
